main event: A small green object with a red flashing light was observed at Oceana NAS, Virginia on December 5, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for 8 hours and 20 minutes,The object first appeared to be stationary and turning counter-clockwise, Later, it appeared to move slowly away from the observer, The object disappeared from view with the coming of dawn, Observers suggested that the object was likely a star or planet.
sighted object: small green object with red flashing light
witness description: control tower operators at Oceana NAS
